thread.title: Hannity Applauds Trump for ‘Total Beatdown’ of the Media at Presser
thread.title_full: Hannity Applauds Trump for ‘Total Beatdown’ of the Media at Presser

author: Josh Feldman
title: Hannity Applauds Trump for ‘Total Beatdown’ of the Media at Presser
text:
Hannity Applauds Trump for ‘Total Beatdown’ of the Media at Presser by Josh Feldman | 2:51   
President-elect Donald Trump got particularly feisty with reporters during his press conference today. He was in a heated back-and-forth with CNN’s Jim Acosta and tore into BuzzFeed over the news outlet publishing a dossier containing unverified allegations against him. 
Many in the press have expressed concerns about Trump’s treatment of reporters, but Sean Hannity ‘s reaction is indicative of how a lot of Trump’s own supporters view what happened today: @realDonaldTrump WOW! A total beatdown of the alt radical left mainstream media. I said in 08'"Journalism is dead". Now it's buried!! 
— Sean Hannity (@seanhannity) January 11, 2017 
(Hannity has recently taken to using the phrase “alt radical left” in response to the rise in usage of “alt-right,” particularly in reference to the mainstream media.) One has to wonder if @donnabrazile and @CNN , who both colluded with @HillaryClinton , gave the talking points on fake news yesterday. Wow!! https://t.co/wWXXz6Nwyi 
— Sean Hannity (@seanhannity) January 11, 2017 
Hannity has also publicly called on Trump to reevaluate the traditional relationship between the White House and the press corps once he takes office. 
[ image via screengrab ]
